ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Sorta new
ygData.msgSnippet: The Omens of War expansion introduced tasks that your character can obtain from various Taskmasters around Norrath. Tasks are available to characters as
ygData.messageBody:
The Omens of War expansion introduced "tasks" that your character can
obtain from various "Taskmasters" around Norrath. Tasks are available
to characters as low as level 3, and the low-level Taskmaster is in
your home town. I've done tasks with various toons at levels 10, 20,
31, and 65 now. The experience reward is decent at all those levels.
The lower-leveled tasks mostly force you to explore around and learn
the environment and worthwhile just for that.

--- Starshyyn <starshyyn@...> wrote:

> Merry Meet!
>
> I have a sorta newby question. Last spring I bought Evolution
> thinking I would
> re-join Norrath. Well, apparently not! My system couldn't handle
> the change
> on the first of April (no matter what I tried, my sad, tired machine
> couldn't deal
> with the changes). So, now I have a new machine that will work with
> the game
> and will be getting dsl shortly. I will be using the game I bought
> (Evolution) and
> would like to know if any of the expansions beyond LoY offer anything
> for the
> 'new', young player or if they are mostly for above levels 20, 30,
> 40, 50 or more?
>
> When I first played (on a borrowed account to see if I would like it)
> I couldn't get
> out of the room/building where I was created!!! It was hysterical!
> My Mentor had
> to come get me! and he was kos in Felwithe! I definately won't be
> repeating
> that scenario......LOL
>
> Starshyyn (I hope)
> Tarew Marr (soon)
> (and others)
>
>
